items.summary: Replace all user-facing branding text in the app UI from “Chat” to “Tchat” where it represents the product/site name (e.g., the unauthenticated welcome headline and the authenticated header title), so the app is branded as Tchat.

Replace the footer domain text and link target from freechat.com to Tchat.com: update the visible link label to “tchat.com” and the href to https://tchat.com while preserving target="_blank" and rel="noopener noreferrer".

Update any app “web domain” mentions in static page metadata to reflect Tchat.com branding (e.g., the HTML document title if it still uses generic/old branding), ensuring no freechat.com references remain in the frontend static entrypoint.
